heading: Microbiology – Foundations of Life Sciences
subHeading: Concepts, laboratory fundamentals, microbial techniques, and modern applications.
quickIntro: The B.Sc Microbiology program under the University of Madras provides a strong foundation in microbial physiology, genetics, immunology, clinical microbiology, and biotechnology. This course prepares students for higher studies, research careers, and laboratory roles in hospitals, biotech companies, and scientific institutions.
